mapper.select: select t2.* from (select t1.*, dense_rank() over (partition by area_code order by cnt desc, s_no, a_no ) chart from (select s_no, a_no, s_name, s_path, area_code, area_name loc, count(*) cnt from playinfo join sound using(s_no, a_no) join area using (area_code) where area_code=3 group by s_no, a_no, s_name, s_path, area_code, area_name order by cnt) t1) t2 where chart<=10

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}
